title: Generate random-looking IDs from integer ranks — sqids
text: sqids() alternative dplyr::row_number() generates random-looking IDs integer ranks using Sqids (formerly Hashids). IDs generated sqids() can easily decoded back original ranks using unsqids().

title: Generate random-looking IDs from integer ranks — sqids
Generate random-looking IDs from integer ranks — sqids
text: x sqids(), vector rank. can leave argument missing refer "current" row number 'dplyr' verbs. unsqids(), character vector IDs. .salt Integers use value x generate IDs. .ties Method rank duplicate values. One "sequential", "min", "max", "dense". See ties argument vctrs::vec_rank() details.

title: Generate random-looking IDs from integer ranks — sqids
text: sqids(), character vector IDs. unsqids(), integers.

title: Generate random-looking IDs from integer ranks — sqids
code: ids <- sqids(c(5, 1, 3, 2, 2, NA)) ids #> [1] "cjuiea7YwmO" "GpUYec8C9SD" "HnVrUtYxjxO" "6Xge9xA9Rhq" "YwEGRTfU80b" #> [6] NA            unsqids(ids) #> [1]  5  1  4  2  3 NA  df <- data.frame(   grp = c(1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 2, 3, 3, 3) ) # You can use `sqids()` without referencing `x` in dplyr verbs. dplyr::mutate(df, sqids = sqids(), row_id = unsqids(sqids)) #>   grp       sqids row_id #> 1   1 eH6wVlCO0ZA      1 #> 2   1 0dTSmtQKakU      2 #> 3   1 pAkeMlWKnO9      3 #> 4   2 1a79sLUZt7r      4 #> 5   2 GQUUYcFb9Ub      5 #> 6   2 xcoeNCjm76h      6 #> 7   3 Z7Md7UY60wE      7 #> 8   3 gWHmfJheCXR      8 #> 9   3 JoagzEH8OKT      9 # Use `.ties` to control how to rank duplicate values. dplyr::mutate(df, sqids = sqids(grp, .ties = "min"), grp_id = unsqids(sqids)) #>   grp       sqids grp_id #> 1   1 tCyn3JsAbMw      1 #> 2   1 tCyn3JsAbMw      1 #> 3   1 tCyn3JsAbMw      1 #> 4   2 zhcShwOlmwh      4 #> 5   2 zhcShwOlmwh      4 #> 6   2 zhcShwOlmwh      4 #> 7   3 mcxhx3D6HHY      7 #> 8   3 mcxhx3D6HHY      7 #> 9   3 mcxhx3D6HHY      7 # When you need to generate the same IDs for each group, fix the `.salt`: dplyr::mutate(df, sqids = sqids(.salt = 1234L), .by = grp) #>   grp sqids #> 1   1 Rge1J #> 2   1 W70Dc #> 3   1 LQpzb #> 4   2 Rge1J #> 5   2 W70Dc #> 6   2 LQpzb #> 7   3 Rge1J #> 8   3 W70Dc #> 9   3 LQpzb
